00071 void RainbruRPG::Terminal::ListView::draw( int x, int y ){
00072   int xp= (x+this->x)-2;
00073   int yp= (y+this->y)-1;
00074 
00075   // Sets the draw color according to the focus state of the widget
00076   if (this->hasFocus)
00077     SLsmg_set_color (6);
00078   else
00079     SLsmg_set_color (0);
00080 
00081   // Draw the frame of the widget
00082   SLsmg_draw_box ( yp, xp, height, width );
00083 
00084 
00085   // Draws the caption if enabled
00086   if (drawCaption)
00087     this->drawTheCaption(xp, yp);
00088 
00089   drawColumns(xp, yp);
00090 
00091 
00092   unsigned int itemNum=0;
00093   // Draws the items
00094   tListViewItemList::const_iterator iter;
00095   // Iterate through list and output each column
00096   for (iter=itemList.begin(); iter != itemList.end(); iter++){
00097     if (hasFocus && selType==LVS_LINE && itemNum==selectedItem)
00098       drawItem( (*iter), xp+1, yp+2+itemNum, true );
00099     else if (hasFocus && selType==LVS_CELL && itemNum==selectedItem)
00100       drawItem( (*iter), xp+1, yp+2+itemNum, true );
00101     else
00102       drawItem( (*iter), xp+1, yp+2+itemNum, false );
00103 
00104     itemNum++;
00105   }
00106 }

00114 void RainbruRPG::Terminal::ListView::receiveKeyEvent(int ch){
00115   if (ch==1) // haut
00116     keyUpHit();
00117 
00118   if (ch==2) // down
00119     keyDownHit();
00120 
00121   if (ch==3){ // Left
00122     keyLeftHit();
00123   }
00124   else if (ch==4){ //Right
00125     keyRightHit();
00126   }
00127 }

00144 void RainbruRPG::Terminal::ListView::drawTheCaption( int x, int y){
00145   SLsmg_gotorc ( y, x+2);
00146   SLsmg_set_char_set (1);
00147   SLsmg_write_char( SLSMG_RTEE_CHAR );
00148   SLsmg_set_char_set (0);
00149 
00150   SLsmg_printf( " %s ", caption );
00151   SLsmg_set_char_set (1);
00152   SLsmg_write_char( SLSMG_LTEE_CHAR );
00153   SLsmg_set_char_set (0);
00154 }

00162 void RainbruRPG::Terminal::ListView::drawColumns( int x, int y){
00163   unsigned int columnNum=0;
00164   unsigned int fillY=0;
00165 
00166   // Makes the header background
00167   SLsmg_set_color(2);
00168   SLsmg_gotorc( y+1, x+1);
00169   SLsmg_write_nchars("                                     ", width-2);
00170 
00171 
00172   tListViewColumnList::const_iterator iter;
00173 
00174   // Iterate through list and output each column
00175   for (iter=columnList.begin(); iter != columnList.end(); iter++){
00176     // Draw the background of a preselected column
00177     if (hasFocus && selType==LVS_COLUMN && selectedColumn==columnNum){
00178       SLsmg_set_color(1);
00179       for (fillY=0; fillY!=this->height-3; fillY++){
00180         SLsmg_gotorc( y+fillY+2, x+1);
00181         SLsmg_write_nchars("                       ", (*iter)->getWidth());
00182 
00183       }
00184 
00185     }
00186 
00187     // Draws the column's caption
00188     SLsmg_set_color(2);
00189     SLsmg_gotorc( y+1, x+1);
00190     SLsmg_printf( "%s", (*iter)->getCaption() );
00191     
00192     SLsmg_set_color(10);
00193     SLsmg_gotorc( y+1, x+1+(*iter)->getWidth());
00194     SLsmg_write_char( SLSMG_VLINE_CHAR );
00195     
00196     // Draws the vertical line
00197     SLsmg_set_color(0);
00198     SLsmg_gotorc ( y+2, x+1+(*iter)->getWidth());
00199     SLsmg_draw_vline(height-3);
00200     SLsmg_set_color(0);
00201     
00202     x+=(*iter)->getWidth()+1;
00203     columnNum++;
00204   }
00205 }

00215 void RainbruRPG::Terminal::ListView::drawItem(ListViewItem* it, int x, int y,
00216                                               bool selected){
00217   unsigned int columnNum=0;
00218 
00219   // Draw the first column
00220   tListViewColumnList::const_iterator iter;
00221 
00222   // Iterate through list and output each column
00223   for (iter=columnList.begin(); iter != columnList.end(); iter++){
00224     // The column selection handle
00225     if (hasFocus && selType==LVS_COLUMN && selectedColumn==columnNum){
00226       SLsmg_set_color(1);
00227     }
00228     else if (hasFocus && selType==LVS_CELL 
00229              && selectedColumn==columnNum && selected){
00230       SLsmg_set_color(1);
00231     }
00232     else if (hasFocus && selType==LVS_LINE && selected){
00233       SLsmg_set_color(1);
00234     }
00235     else{
00236       SLsmg_set_color(0);
00237     }
00238 
00239 
00240     SLsmg_gotorc( y, x);
00241     SLsmg_printf( "%s", it->getColumn(columnNum) );
00242 
00243     columnNum++;
00244     x+=(*iter)->getWidth()+1;
00245   }
00246 
00247 }

00261 void RainbruRPG::Terminal::ListView::keyLeftHit(){
00262   unsigned int max=columnList.size();
00263 
00264   selectedColumn--;
00265   if (selectedColumn<0 || selectedColumn>max)
00266     selectedColumn=0;
00267 }
00268 
00272 void RainbruRPG::Terminal::ListView::keyRightHit(){
00273   unsigned int max=columnList.size()-1;
00274 
00275   selectedColumn++;
00276   if (selectedColumn>max)
00277     selectedColumn=max;
00278 
00279 }

00284 void RainbruRPG::Terminal::ListView::keyUpHit(){
00285   unsigned int max=itemList.size();
00286 
00287   selectedItem--;
00288   if (selectedItem<0 || selectedItem>max)
00289     selectedItem=0;
00290 }

00295 void RainbruRPG::Terminal::ListView::keyDownHit(){
00296   unsigned int max=itemList.size()-1;
00297 
00298   selectedItem++;
00299   if (selectedItem<0 || selectedItem>max)
00300     selectedItem=max;
00301 }
